item.description:
Local Rehab Expert

Chris Coute

of Brownstone Realty, LLC

Chris will discuss local rehabs,

the importance of creating a good team,

and HOW TO:

Source possible deals

Analyze transactions

Manage contractors

Best prepare your properties for resale

Deal with inevitable obstacles when rehabbing

Monthly Meeting

5:30 PM Networking, 6:30 PM Meeting, Thursday, Feb 21, 2013

Crowne Plaza, 320 Washington St., Newton, MA

Free for members; $25 for nonmembers

 

The Boston Area Real Estate Investing Association Monthly Meeting (AREIA) is group of like-minded real estate investors, entrepreneurs and professionals, coming together to discuss and share deals, investing techniques, contacts, methods, financing, strategies, education, motivation, training, mentoring and success.

 

Networking with others is the fastest way to accelerate your success. They welcome newcomers and seasoned pros alike, as well as product and service providers to the industry. If you are just thinking about investing, come and talk to others who are doing it.

 

Monthly meetings are open to all. Bring your deals, bring your business cards. Pre-meeting networking opportunities begin at 5:30 PM, and networking continues after the meeting.  The Boston AREIA won 3 awards at the National REIA Leadership Conference - come and find out for yourself why they are different.

 

Bring your business cards!  This will be a great networking opportunity.  Come and meet someone who has information that's valuable to the success of your business!

 

Monthly meetings 3rd Thursday of each month

5:30pm -- Networking open to members & visitors 
6:30pm -- Meeting starts 
9:00pm -- Networking continues until everyone is gone!

Boston AREIA is organized by Bernadette Trafton.  More info at http://bostonareia.com/
item.name: Boston Area Real Estate Investing Association (AREIA)
